template.query:
SELECT * FROM books
WHERE title || author || ISBN || category ILIKE '%{{searchInventoryTextInput.value}}%' order by title ASC;

SELECT *
FROM books
INNER JOIN orders
ON books.book_id = orders.book_id
LEFT JOIN discount_codes
ON orders.discount_code_id = discount_codes.discount_code_id
ORDER BY orders.order_id DESC;

template.confirmationMessage: ### Are you sure you want to buy the book - {{keyValue1.data.title}} for ${{keyValue1.data.price}}?

template.query: SELECT * FROM books order by book_id DESC;

template.label: Search by ISBN, book title, or author
